attributes.action: Fund the RNLI and AIR AMBULANCE with the money saved from the MPs claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the MPs claims are being restricted the money that would have been available to be claimed should be put aside for legitimate funding of these essential life saving charities

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
